# destination

**Instance Property**

The destination for any captured command data.

## Declaration

```swift
var destination: MTLCaptureDestination { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCaptureDestination/developerTools].

## Setting capture parameters

- **captureObject**: The instance whose contents should be captured.
- **outputURL**: A URL for a file to write the capture data into.
